summary: Describe your project in about 150 characters. What is the one thing you want people to know right away?
impact: What was the impact of your project? What are you most proud of? Did it have any lasting or residual effects?
procedure: How did you get it done? How did you navigate the bureaucratic waters?
mistakes & lessons learned: We learn the most from our mistakes. Looking back, what did you do wrong? If you could do it again, what would you do differently?
future plans: What are your plans for the future? How do you create project longevity?
